summary: MY DAUGHTER'S 2002 JEEP LIBERTY'S DRIVER'S SIDE FRONT TIE ROD ASSEMBLY SHEERED IN HALF CAUSING MY DAUGHTER TO HIT ANOTHER VEHICLE. MY DAUGHTER ALSO SUSTAINED A CLOSED HEAD INJURY AS A RESULT OF THE INCIDENT. THIS INCIDENT OCCURED THUSDAY FEBRUARY 6, 2003. HER LEASED 2002 LIBERTY WILL BE 1 YEAR OLD MAY 2003.
